How to install Jython on Macintosh

  • Install the java development kit: ftp://ftp.apple.com/developer/Development_Kits/MRJ_SDK_2.2_Install.sit.bin.
    It is from http://developer.apple.com/java/download.html.
    Don't choose MRJ 2.2.3, because it has does not have _batteries included_.
  • The Jython installer: http://www.jython.org/download.html
  • Start the the jython installer.
  • Running the jython installer.
  • Create binding for jython.jar.
  • Run the jython interpreter.
